titleStmt.title: Apples of gold for young men and vvomen, and a crown of glory for old men and women. Or, The happiness of being good betimes, and the honour of being an old disciple Clearly and fully discovered, and closely, and faithfully applyed. Also the young mans objections answered, and the old mans doubts resolved. By Thomas Brooks preacher of the gospel at Margarets new Fishstreet-hill.
titleStmt.author: Brooks, Thomas, 1608-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R.I. for John Hancock, to be sold at the first shop in Popeshead-Alley next to Corn-hill neer the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Identified on film as Wing B4923.
Reproduction of the original in Sion College Library, London.
